DOC.brief_summary: The objective prospective clinical study investigate difference complication rate tooth- implant- support zirconia base fix dental prosthesis ( FDPs ) least 4 unit . The null-hypothesis difference complication rate implant- support tooth- support zirconia FDPs .
DOC.detailed_description: The study aim provide evidence regard clinical behaviour long-span tooth- implant-supported FDPs .
DOC.criteria: Patients older 18 year Missing least two adjacent teeth maxilla mandibular Sufficient oral hygiene Addiction alcohol drug Severe craniomandibular disorder Severe systematic disease Patients unable unwilling sign inform consent form Untreated periodontitis
